author: Jitendra Soni
title: Google using phone location data to show the impact of lockdown
description: Anonymized user data collected from phones where location history is turned on.
content:
Google has released a report to show how effectively coronavirus-mandated lockdown guidelines are being followed across the world. 
Covering 131 countries, the findings reveal that lockdowns have already severely altered the lifestyle habits of people in man… [+3119 chars]
